IT für Versicherungen Leipzig

Test Leadership in Agile World

  • Home
11 December 2018

I was invited to speak at IT für Versicherungen in Leipzig with my talk Test Leadership in Agile World. I talked about:

  • Challenges for test managers in agile transformation
  • How to move around and provide different values to the teams
  • How does the role change in terms of leadership
